nodes.text: The Nirellia system was a star system located in the Oktos sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It was home to the creatures known as Nirellian ground-slugs.
The Nirellia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square Q-11.
